title: Peaceful protests in SL were heard around the world: US Ambassador
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The peaceful protests across Sri Lanka have been loud enough to be heard around the world, says the Ambassador of United States to Sri Lanka, Julie Chung.
In a tweet, she further stated that every Sri Lankan has the right to express their opinion and use their voice, while all sides must continue to prioritize peace at every step along the way.
Peaceful protests in SL were heard around the world: US Ambassador
